item.description:
let's meetup at ryle's to hear a truly terrific singer (and blues harp player!), diane blue. diane plays regularly at the cantab lounge in cambridge's central square, but ryles offers a roomier venue with the option of dining beforehand.

follow this link to hear diane belt out some great soul & motown classics.

as diane's web page says, she delivers "Rockin' R&B, Red-hot blues, Groovin' funk & soul."

come on out and be blown away by diane's powerful performing!

notes:


  • ryle's cover charge is $8
  • dinner is served from 5p-11p
  • i'll be there at around 8:15. look for me at the bar.
  • i'll also send an email the afternoon of the meetup w/my cell #
  • this is a joint meetup with Fun with Alcohol and Social Fun
item.how_to_find_us: i'll be at the bar and i'll send an email with my cell # before the event
item.name: Diane Blue @ Ryles Jazz Club
